text: Bottighofen is a municipality of the district of Kreuzlingen in the canton of Thurgau in Switzerland. Bottighofen is on Lake Constance. == References == ==Other websites== *http://www.svb-bottighofen.ch/images/hafen.jpg *http://www.bottighofen.ch *http://www.bottighofen.ch.vu/ Category:Municipalities in Kreuzlingen
title: Bottighofen
